channel.title: Trade Lv.2 : Best Friend Mission
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Trade Lv.2 : Best Friend Mission" - need help how to pass it (mod edited)

item.title: Re: TRADE LV.2 : BEST FRIEND MISSION
item.content:encoded:
Please do not put your subjects in all capital letters.

You need to be hanging out with both Right and Anonymous on the same day. "Best friends" and "Hanging out" are the same thing.

item.title: TRADE LV.2 : BEST FRIEND MISSION
item.content:encoded:
how i know i am the best friend for right and anonym ?? how many FP to pass this mission ?
tq
